headline: Cloud APIs and SDKs to Create, Edit and Manage Word, Excel, PDF and More
description: Aspose.Total Cloud offers REST based SDKs providing the capabilities for document generation, conversion & automation platform.  The SDKs can be called from any platform: .NET, Java, Ruby, Salesforce, & Amazon etc. It makes easier for the Web & Mobile application developers to use our award winning SDKs to work with MS Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Adobe PDFs, OpenDocument formats, Barcodes, OCR, Microsoft Visio Diagrams & Email formats & protocols in their apps.
